评论详情: They seem like a good fit for my toddler. Love the price point for the quality, and so far are nicely water resistant. Only complaint is that they make a lot of noise - not squeaking really but like the faux leather rubbing together sound. Surprisingly loud. Otherwise, good shoe.

类型: Size: 13 Wide Little KidColor: Dark Gray
评论详情: These shoes are a little odd. They are quite wide (which they advertise, so I'm not holding that against them).  I've never actually seen a child with feet that wide before.  They are easy to put on and they do look kind of cool.  With that said, as they are barefoot shoes, they don't provide much support, and the material is kind of odd.  I don't really have anything concretely negative to say about them. They are just odd in multiple ways and while I can see them being good for kids running around outside with their friends, I'd never send my kid to school in them or really take them anywhere away from home wearing them.
These are perfect to style with anything

These shoes are cute, but I put them on my toddler and they just look way too bulky and unattractive on her. She seemed to have a harder time picking up her feet and walking with them than other shoes we have tried so they are a no go for us.
Decently made. Good fit, comfortable.

评论概述: Good basic indoor walking shoe for new walkers
评论详情: I liked the wide fit for my daughter who is just learning to walk. They seem comfortable for her to walk indoors but I don’t know that they’d stand up to our outdoor adventures. They aren’t ugly but they aren’t particularly stylish either.

Shoes were soft but not thrilled with the way they look. The Velcro shows and looks so bad. I shipped the shoes to my grandson. No way to return them.  Now I’m buying a second pair of shoes. Waste of money on these.

评论概述: Cute and available in wide size
类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Little KidColor: Dark Brown
评论详情: These are cute dress up/down shoes. I got these for the 4-year-old to wear on picture day. They had the option for a wide fit, which can be hard to find. They were also easy for him to get on and walk around in. I like the versatility of the brown to dress up with khaki pants or to dress down with some jeans. The Velcro strap allows him to take them on and off by himself. Regular width shoe included for comparison.

These shoes are super cute and solid. They hold baby's feet really well.  The velcro is a bonus because anyone with a baby knows they wiggle!  These are great little starter shoes for babes who are just learning to master walking because they are nice and flat with solid little soles, so baby's feet feel secure, especially with the nonslip soles. Overall a decent first shoe.

评论概述: Perfect first walking shoe. He loves them.  Great fit for his little fat thick wide foot.
评论详情: These shoes are very well made. Flexible. Easy on and off. The wide toe box was exactly what he needed. They are very lightweight also.

This is toddler boot was so stinking cute! As I find myself in a rush I tend to gear away from shoe laces until my kiddos get older and velcro is the way to go. There are so easy to slide on and take off. The boots are super wide with plenty of room around the toe area. I wouldn't size up or down unless your kid is in-between sizes. The dark gray is so in style and I simply couldn't be more happy!

My daughter has a chunky wide foot and I typically wear only buy stride rite for her . I found these and decided to give a try . They are easy to put on, she loves to keep them On so I’m assuming she thinks they are comfy ( she’s just starting to talk ) and they are cute . They seem durable and pretty high quality for what I was wanting .

My daughter loves these shoes. I was worried they would be too bulky for her, but she says they’re really comfortable. They are easy for her to put on and take off on her own. I love the rainbow strap.

评论概述: Nicely Made for Wider Little Feet
类型: Size: 11.5 Wide Little KidColor: Dark Gray
评论详情: I got these shoes for my 4 1/2-year-old son, and they're just as described. These shoes definitely have a wider footbed than most other shoes out there, and my son's been really liking them. He says they're super comfortable to wear, and I appreciate that they have Velcro closures that make them easy to put on and take off himself. As for sizing, he's got wider than average feet, and these accommodate his foot shape nicely. They do seem to run a bit big, though, but I mean he'll grow into them. These shoes seem to be made well, too, and look good on. The dark gray goes with most anything, and I know he'll be getting a lot of wear out of them. Nice shoes!
I'm excited for my littles to wear these. They are well made and soft. The velcro straps mean my littles can put them on without help. Which is great for me because we are in the "I do it" phase.

类型: Size: 12.5 Wide Little KidColor: Dark Brown
评论详情: Fit is great. Perfect for what we need. The color is completely off. These are orange.

These are so adorable. They are fairly flexible, which helps get them on. They fit true to size. At first my son said that the top bothered him because it was so high, but then ran around saying he was super fast. Haha. I think that they will feel better the more he wears them and they break in.

I love the color first off it’s beautiful shade. The material is soft and the sole of the shoe is so flexible.. I’m impressed with it. The double Velcro with hold the little feet in and help with future fine motor/independent skills.

评论概述: Toddler Little Kids Wide Barefoot Shoes Boys Girls Winter High Top
评论详情: Amazing quality shoes for kids.  These high tops are super cute durable and quality made fit my daughter true to size and easy to put on for her

评论概述: Stylish and Cozy Footwear for Little Feet
评论详情: The WateLves toddler wide barefoot shoes are a great choice for keeping kids comfortable during winter. With a high-top design and faux fur lining, these minimalist sneakers provide warmth and support while allowing for natural foot movement. Whether for playdates or dressier occasions, these leather boots offer a stylish yet practical option for boys and girls alike!

Sadly these are too big and we’ll have to wait a while for my daughter to start wearing them. But they are well made  and soft shoes, with lots of toe space. We’ve been trying to get all else toed shoes for our kids so they can have maximum comfort and development. These shoes are very nice.

These snow boots are warm, easy to get on, and have good traction - a win all around! My little one took some time getting used to them since they are a bit heavier than normal shoes. But they are nicely flexible in the sole, which helps! True to size, and great for winter fun!

These shoes are very well constructed and really cute. They are a bit stiffer and thicker than I expected, but the soles do have flex to them. The insoles provide a good surface feel for the little walker, and yet still have support and some cushion. The bottoms are grippy and will prevent slipping and sliding. These are going to be a great little winter boot.

It is SO hard to find shoes for my daughter because she has a high instep (the top of her foot in chunky) but not a long or wide foot. Perfectly average foot other than a high instep. So trying to find a shoe that the top of her foot fits into but isn’t too big or wide for her feels impossible. These shoes however are PERFECT. I did order a shoe that’s slightly bigger just to be on the safe side but it fits perfect in every way! And they’re cute too!!

These barefoot shoes are perfect for toddlers, v cute, made well, easy for them to walk in and run in, with plenty of toe space. They are lightweight yet secure. Def recommend. I did size up one since our 2 yr olds feet are quickly growing, but I’m glad I did cause the bigger size was actually perfect.

I absolutely love these shoes. As soon as I opened the box, I was impressed by the high quality of these shoes. They are well made with high quality materials and they appear to be durable. They are easy to put on and off, and the velcro is very sturdy. My son is 15 months old, and he tends to loose his balance and fall often, but these shoes offer great ankle support that help him maintain his balance. They also appear to be comfortable. They are true to size and a good fit.  Overall, I am extremely happy with the quality and performance of these shoes, I actually already ordered a second pair. I most definitely recommend them.

These are indeed wide and well made. True to size and roomy. She likes them and was able to run and play. I can see that the barefoot approach at this age makes sense. The movement looks more natural and graceful compared to harder boots. The materials all seem high quality and the color matches the photos.  I certainly recommend. No issues.

These are great to give your toddler space in the toebox of their show. They fit true to size. They look just like the stock photos. They are not quite as flexible as you want in a more natural based shoe though. However, they do support the ankle being high tops. Not a bad choice but I'm still searching for more flexibility.

I got this shoe for my almost 2 year old. He currently wears a 6, 6.5 shoe so I decided to go with the size 7 for the winter with thick socks. The width of the shoe makes it very easy to slip on his foot and seem comfortable. Unfortunately he's not used to the higher top sneaker and did not want it on. Although I did order a half size up, it seemed to be WAY bigger than I thought. Overall, I like this wide width high top shoe for my son.

I ordered the pink boots for my 16 month old who has wide and chunky feet. These are the first shoes I have found that fit her. She gets excited to put them on. They are adorable and good quality. I recommend for chunky baby feet!

I was searching for some fall/winger boots for my daughter. she's 6 years old and I wanted to get ready for the fall and winter season. I saw these really cute boots that I thought she'd like.  she wears a size 11 in kids and she fits this one just fine. it's a little bit big for her but that's good it gives her time to grow into it. it has enough room in the front and it's wide for her big old wide feet lol. she says it's really comfortable and I look super cute with a lot of outfits

My great nephew is two and he has the widest and tallest (yes, tallest) chonky feet I've ever seen! He had to go shoeless for so long because his feet are so different than the average toddler feet. I was really excited to come across a shoe that was made for these special little people! First off, I will admit these shoes are not the most attractive shoes ever, but when you are in our situation, you really are excited to finally find a shoe that fits and is comfortable for your little person.  These boots have real leather uppers and are soft and flexible. I love the hook and loop straps. Having this kind of strap makes getting the boots on and off a breeze! This type of strap also gives you the ability to tighten the shoe to a comfortable level. I will say to be aware that I ordered a 7, but when they came they were a lot bigger than all his other size 7's. We are going to keep them though, as our guy just turned two and is in a growth spurt. Most likely by the time he needs these boots this winter they will be close to fitting. I would just say they run pretty big.  All in all his Mom was very happy with the versatility and quality of these boots. Perfect for our wonderful little person with extra special feet!
